name: physics-dynamics
description: Configure and tune Rapier3D physics simulation with WASM safety guards
capabilities: Collider shape setup (cuboid, ball, capsule, cylinder, mesh)
constraints: ALL numeric inputs MUST pass Number.isFinite() before passing to WASM
Heightfield and Trimesh dimensions MUST be Math.floor() integers
Direct RAPIER.World access restricted to PhysicsService only
Never pass NaN, Infinity, or undefined to physics API
validation: Verify collision shapes match visual meshes
Validate mass properties are positive finite numbers
example_usage: Use this skill to spawn physics objects, configure collision, or tune simulation parameters
